title: Will Arnett | Colbert Classic
description:
Will Arnett and Stephen talk about the time Will was dressed as Batman backstage at the Academy Awards, his podcast, "SmartLess," and the joys of blowing up epic LEGO builds on "LEGO Masters."
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
